title: Andy McDonald – 2020 Statement on TUC’s Report
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the comments made by Andy McDonald, the Shadow Secretary for Employment Rights and Protection, on 27 April 2020.
content:
With the country pulling together during this time of crisis, Labour is working constructively with the Government to stop the spread of the coronavirus and support workers and businesses.
